inclusion.criterion: relapsed Graves' disease despite an adequate ATD treatment for 18 months or more
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: HIFU accessibility of the targeted area (distance between the skin and the anterior surface of the nodule less than 10 mm; with no interference of the collarbone with HIFU unit movements)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: on at least 2-week of β-blockade prior to HIFU
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: absence of vocal cord immobility at laryngoscopy
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients who prefer or indicated for surgery
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: head and/or neck disease preventing hyperextension of the neck
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: history of thyroid cancer or other malignant tumors in the neck region
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: any contraindication related to intravenous moderate sedation
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and history of neck irradiation, which are likely triggers for exclusion.
